column2: BRIEF-Badger Meter Posts Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $0.41 April 16 (Reuters) - Badger Meter Inc: * Q1 SALES $108.5 MILLION VERSUS REFINITIV IBES ESTIMATE OF $106.7 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE ESTIMATE $0.37 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA * BADGER METER - IMPLEMENTED TEMPORARY COST CONTAINMENT ACTIONS, INCLUDING REDUCTIONS IN DISCRETIONARY SPENDING, HIRING FREEZE, REDUCED WORK HOUR FURLOUGHS, EXECUTIVE SALARY REDUCTIONS * SAYS HAVE APPROXIMATELY $70 MILLION IN CASH ON BALANCE SHEET, AND $125 MILLION OF REVOLVING CREDIT AVAILABILITY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Badger Meter Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.26 April 17 (Reuters) - Badger Meter Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.37 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * “DESPITE LOWER Q1 RESULTS, WE REMAIN OPTIMISTIC ABOUT 2018” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
